description:
Get the news you need and an endless stream of stories you love, summarized by Yahoo

The Yahoo App brings you the latest headline news, stories, and Yahoo’s Digital Magazines! 

Favorite features

- Personalized feed of stories and articles Access to the latest news, local weather, popular photos and videos, your stocks and more
- Yahoo’s Digital Magazines including: Yahoo Food, Yahoo Tech, Yahoo Travel, Yahoo Movies, Yahoo Beauty, and Yahoo Health
- Explore 12 categories: News, Business, Celebrities, Entertainment, Finance, Health, 
Media, Politics, Science, Society, Sports, and Technology
- Stay up to date with notifications on breaking news
- Share stories, video, and photos directly to those in your circle
- Get summaries before reading the full article
- Enjoy beautiful visual cards that display images and videos from each story  

Helpful tips

- Sign in to manage and save your news preferences
- Select the stories you want to see more or less of at bottom of each article
- Swipe left or right to navigate between stories in full screen view
- Tap the Yahoo logo to instantly see all the news categories
- Save stories to read later. Access them in Main Menu > My Saves

What people are saying

“The app's personalization strategy, which combines editorial curation with machine learning, are drawing users back…” - Casey Newton, The Verge

Tell us what you think

We are committed to building the best mobile experiences and would love to hear your feedback.

Let us know your thoughts here: http://feedback.yahoo.com/forums/202744
